title: Feng Shui Calculator
disclaimer: It's just for fun. Please don't take the results too seriously! Consult a professional Feng Shui master for accurate Feng Shui advice.
badFengShui: Bad Feng Shui (Major Adjustment or Remediation Needed)

1.label: Green Dragon (Left)
1.description: Buildings on the left side of the house are slightly taller

2.label: White Tiger (Right)
2.description: Buildings on the right side of the house are slightly lower

3.label: Red Phoenix (Front)
3.description: Open space in front of the house with water features (park, river)

4.label: Black Tortoise (Back)
4.description: Mountains or tall buildings behind the house for support

2.title: Negative Formations (Xing Sha)
2.info: Unreasonable natural landscapes around the house.

1.label: Road Rush
1.description: Main door or windows directly facing a straight road, stairs, or corridor

2.label: Sharp Corner Sha
2.description: Sharp corner or wall edge of another building pointing directly at the house

3.label: Reverse Bow Sha
3.description: Road or river curves away from the house like an arrow being shot

4.label: Heaven's Blade Sha
4.description: Narrow gap between two tall buildings directly facing the house

5.label: Piercing Heart Sha
5.description: Underground passage, subway, or roadway passing beneath the building

6.label: Light Sha
6.description: Direct exposure to glass facades or strong light for prolonged periods

1.label: Negative (Yin)
1.description: Hospital, garbage dump, electrical substation, high-voltage tower, temple

2.label: Not Facing Bathroom, Kitchen, or Balcony Door

1.label: Located in Front Half of House
